sentences.sContent: We came in peace for all mankind.
sentences.sCn: 我们代表全人类为和平目的而来。

sentences.sContent: To live in peace and security and to give our children a better future.
sentences.sContent_eng: To live in peace and security and to give our children a better future.
sentences.sCn: 生活在和平与安全之中，并给我们的后代一个更好的未来。

sentences.sContent: It will come with a new flag raised for a democratic Palestine to live side by side in peace with Israel.
sentences.sContent_eng: It will come with a new flag raised for a democratic Palestine to live side by side in peace with Israel.
sentences.sCn: 在它降临时，一面新的旗帜会高高升起，象征着民主的巴勒斯坦与以色列和平并存。
